subject: Re: New Starter
preview: Hi Allie,  I never received an email when the trades quote for 4 President Ave Miranda was accepted. Could you please make sure myself, Stuart and Janai all receive acceptance emails?  Warm regards,

full_threads.body:
Hi Allie,

I never received an email when the trades quote for 4 President Ave Miranda was accepted. Could you please make sure myself, Stuart and Janai all receive acceptance emails?

Warm regards,

Jen Lovegrove
